metadata.Title: CVE-2020-27790 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low
metadata.Description:
A floating point exception issue was discovered in UPX inPackLinuxElf64::invert_pt_dynamic() function of p_lx_elf.cpp file. Anattacker with a crafted input file could trigger this issue that couldcause a crash leading to a denial of service. The highest impact is toAvailability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-27790` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

upx-ucl - 3.96-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: upx-ucl package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.96-3').
